title: ABOUT US
text: Hostelhaze is a website through which you can handle the hostel in a systematic approach. This website will help the students to see all the activities related to hostels. This website expected to limit human works and make hostel allocation much easier for students and hostel adminstration. It is very easy to use. It was designed to provide a computerized process that is stress free and quick. Our Website deals with the problems on handling the hostel record manually.
